nodes.text: We should keep fighting for Iraquis' freedom
as it has advanced and changed lives in Asia and Latin America and Eastern Europe and Africa
We believe that when all Middle Eastern peoples are finally allowed to live and think and work and worship as free men and women they will reclaim the greatness of their own heritage.
We believe that freedom can advance and change lives in the greater Middle East
And when that day comes the bitterness and burning hatreds that feed terrorism will fade and die away.
America and all the world will be safer when hope has returned to the Middle East
